full_summary:
# Life Cycle Management Specialist, Intermediate

**Tender ID:** W8485-TSPS2024-07/B
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Notice Date:** June 5, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2024 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2026

## Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Life Cycle Management Specialist, Intermediate to support Director Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Tactical Aviation & Simulators).

## Overview
The contract will be a two-year term with two irrevocable option years, allowing Canada to extend the contract term. The successful bidder will provide the services of one Intermediate (level 2) Life Cycle Management Specialist.

## Scope
The scope of work includes the provision of Logistics Support Services for Military Aerospace-related projects. The specialist will be responsible for managing the life cycle of equipment, including planning, procurement, maintenance, and disposal.

## Pre-Qualified Suppliers
Only pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) can submit a proposal. The interested suppliers can contact Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) to become pre-qualified.

## Eligible Suppliers
The eligible suppliers are listed below:
- Adirondack Information Management Inc.
- Akkodis Canada Inc.
- Appian Corporation
- Arup Canada Inc.
- Calian Ltd.
- Deloitte Inc.
- Fleetway Inc.
- IPSS Inc.
- Norda Stelo Inc.
- Promaxis Systems Inc
- Technomics, Incorporated
- Thomas&Schmidt Inc
- Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
- V42 Management Consulting Inc.
- Valcom Consulting group Inc.

## Security Requirements
The successful bidder must have a Secret level Security Clearance.

## Important Dates
- Tender Closing Date: June 20, 2024 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: July 1, 2024
- Expected Contract End Date: June 30, 2026

## Contact Information
For any queries or questions, please contact Chantal Leavoy, DND Point of Contact at:
chantal.leavoy@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-6940
455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC. J8X 2L5
